game.name: Restless Dreams
game.shortDescription: Before you realize it, dreams have become a curse. Wander through a room shrouded in darkness and delve into the depths of her mind. Descend into the abyss of anguish and despair in this story-driven first-person horror game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Before you realize it, dreams have become a curse. Wander through a room shrouded in darkness and delve into the depths of her mind. Descend into the abyss of anguish and despair in this story-driven first-person horror game.
